title: Beef stroganoff
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) rump steak', 'Salt and black pepper', '150 g (5½ oz) onions, thinly sliced', '125 g (4½ oz) button mushrooms, thinly sliced', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) meat stock, or medium sherry', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 tablespoon brandy, optional', '1 clove garlic, crushed, optional', '4 tablespoons sour cream', '2 teaspoons chopped fresh parsley', 'To garnish: a few sprigs of fresh flat-leaved parsley']
